verses.verse: Then there arose a great <WH1419> cry <WH6818> of the people <WH5971> and of their wives <WH802> against their brethren <WH251> the Jews <WH3064>.

Then held they their peace, and found <WH4672> never a word <WH1697>.

Also I said <WH559>, The thing that <WH1697> ye do <WH6213> is not good <WH2896>: ought ye not to walk <WH3212> in the fear <WH3374> of our God <WH430>, because of the reproach <WH2781> of the nations <WH1471> our enemies <WH341>?

Then said <WH559> they <WH7725>, We will restore them <WH1245>, and will require nothing of them <WH6213>; so will we do, even as thou sayest <WH559>. Then I called <WH7121> the priests <WH3548>, and took an oath <WH7650> of them <WH6213>, that they would do according to this promise <WH1697>.

And all the assembly <WH6951> said <WH559>, Amen <WH543>, and praised <WH1984> Jehovah <WH3068>. And the people <WH5971> did <WH6213> according to this promise <WH1697>.
